title: Free Spirit: Heart and Soul
description: Alex Welsh is an unassuming business entrepreneur. Drawn to do well in life from personal tragedy he does his best to look after the people dearest to him. When a chance meeting on-board a transport ship offers him and his daughter the ability to expand his work in the US he takes up the offer. An offer that will change his life forever and plummet him into the line of fire of a ruthless western gang. Salvation comes in the shape of a spirit horse that offers him a way to exact revenge. A tale set in the age of when man was taming the wild west interspersed with fantasy elements and heroism, lets all have a little Free Spirit in our lives.
author: D.C. Rogers
